msg: Add sys/time.h to mpm_common to include define of timeval.

author: dreid
msg: Tidy up the beos mpm by
- correct a problem with pool allocations that killed the server

author: trawick
msg: Get the ap_config.h cleanup working on FreeBSD by adding includes of
A platform check in logresolve.c to determine whether or not we include
<arpa/inet.h> was converted to a feature check.

author: rbb
msg: Fix the link to the bugDB.  Since we are using GNATS for both 1.3 and
2.0 currently, we only need one link.  This allows people to actually
submit bugs about the 2.0 code base.

author: wrowe
msg: Help Netware admins figure out how to run Apache without YANW
(yet another netware window... trust me, the list gets insane!).
